page.title: 03GORDANO RUGBY CLUB
page.content:
{CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS CONT. BACKHOPS WHELLIES ETC ARE TAUGHT. BEING IN THIS CLUB ALSO ENABLES YOU TO PRACTICE ON A PROPER BMX TRACK.
{RUGBY GORDANO RUGBY CLUB IS SITUATED IN HARBOUR ROAD NEAR PORTISHEAD DOCKS. IT USUALLY STARTS AT 10:30 A.M.ON A SUNDAY AND GOES ON UNTIL 1 P.M. IF WE ARE PLAYING A MATCH WE START AT 10:00 P.M THE TRANSPORT IS PROVIDED BY THE PLAYER'S PARENTS.WHEN WE ARE AT HOME WE PLAY AT GORDANO SCHOOL PLAYING FIELDS.SOME OF THE TEAMS WE PLAY ARE:FRAMPTON COTTERAL, KEYNSHAM, CLEVEDON AND FROME. ABOUT TWICE A SEASON WE HAVE A TOURNAMENT.YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR YOUR OWN KIT.THERE ARE 5 DIFFERENT AGE GROUPS RANGING FROM 9 YEARS OLD TO 13 YEARS OLD.
